abstract: Madison Keys defeats Lauren Davis and Lucie Hradecka beats Sara Errani to advance to Family Circle Cup tennis tournament semifinals; other matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Madison Keys and Lucie Hradecka are surprise semifinalists at the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C.

headline.main: Underdogs in Semifinals at Family Circle Cup

snippet: Madison Keys and Lucie Hradecka are surprise semifinalists at the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C.
